title: 111_hr691
content: Broadband Access Equality Act of 2009 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a general business tax credit for broadband property installed in underserved and rural areas. Allow a 50 credit for the cost of such property installed in areas in which not more than the greater of 5 of households or 20 households have broadband access and a 30 credit for all other underserved and rural areas. Increases by 10 the rate of such credit for high speed broadband service.
